A Chongqing police officer on Xiaohongshu said that his company does not allow the use of Apple phones.
Some people commented that Samsung phones may also not be allowed.
Another comment said that it was said that "something happened and the notice will be released soon."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On August 25, in Bijie, Guizhou, a man smashed his own Japanese restaurant. The owner, Mr. Fu, a young man born after 1995, said that the discharge of nuclear contaminated water from Japan would have an impact on seafood and related industries, and because of his national sentiment, he smashed it without feeling bad.
He plans to turn it into a Chinese restaurant later.
Netizen comments: If you have national sentiment, why did you open a Japanese restaurant in the first place?

On August 25, students from Hunan Changsha Medical College revealed online that the dormitories were still under renovation as the semester was about to start, and the corridors and halls were full of waste and could not be moved in. 
At the school gate, a large number of migrant workers were protesting their rights, and it was suspected that they had a dispute with the construction party and stopped work.

Some people at the scene accused him of extreme nationalism.

content: On August 27, at the Nanjing Wheatfield Music Festival, a fan was taken away by security for waving a flag. It was reported that the flag contained only a line from the Caodong band's lyrics, "Fuck your sea of flowers."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The first domestic dismissal incident due to "nuclear wastewater" remarks
On August 25, a blogger exposed the content of the circle of friends of the head of the clothing brand "Ji Kaos Industry" on Weibo
Afterwards, Jihe.com issued a statement, saying that the head of its sub-brand posted wrong remarks about "nuclear wastewater" in the circle of friends, and after negotiation, the labor cooperation relationship with him was terminated.

has made the Taiwan Strait War once again a topic of concern and anxiety for many netizens
How do we judge when the war will come?
How will the People's Liberation Army attack Taiwan?
How should ordinary people face the coming of war?
Today, I had the honor of interviewing the famous military blogger Xu @xumouren_yt to talk about his views

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Hengshui Middle School and Hengshui No. 2 Middle School asked students to start school early on the pretext of "sending luggage".
The video shows the recording of some class teachers holding class meetings today. The class teachers asked students to "send luggage" to school on the 29th, and kept hinting that students would not leave school after sending luggage, which was actually the start of school.
They also asked students not to make a fuss and keep their mouths shut.
